comment: Hands down the best professor. She cares about you more then you might think. She is always willing to work with you and ensure you do great in the course. She will let you make up the work you falling behind on. She is a reasonable person.

Dr. Howard is the kindest professor I have had at KSU since starting. She's understanding and willing to work with you if you need to catch up as long as you communicate with her. I feel like I have become a better writer in her class, and I recommend her 100%.
She was prompt with email responses and proactive with assignment tips. I had trouble with an assignment and she gave me some helpful suggestions. Seems caring.

I took Dr.Howard's 7-week course and it was not bad at all! Of course, it's a lot of work because we're going twice as fast, but it's not hard at all. She always gave helpful feedback too! She does take a while to grade things, but she's not a very harsh grader. Just do your work on time and according to the rubric and you'll be fine!
Bare minimum teacher. Every time I scheduled an appointment with her she would forget or have an excuse and not answer my emails. I asked her questions for my final paper and she won't answer

She is so awesome, very nice and caring. She's very personable and wants her students to pass. The class isn't easy, there is multiple assignments each week (normally 2), but she's so helpful and available to talk and walk you through stuff. I like how she formats stuff and the assignments, she's also not picky on grammar. Makes it resonable

Professor Howard is one of the best teachers I have had at KSU. Whenever I need clarification on something she is always available to chat whether it is via a teams meeting or email. She genuinely cares about her students and wants them to do well.

Dr. Howard is probably the easiest 1102 professor that you could have. 3 major assignments (research proposal, annotated bib, research essay). Weekly assignments are easy and graded on completion. Gives lots of 100s. Only bad thing about her is that she takes a long time to grade. But take her! You WILL get an A as long as you do the weekly work.

Dr. Howard has been phenomenal. She routinely checked up on the class to make sure we were okay and understanding the instructions. Each week there's a different assignment like a discussion post and at the end of the course you submit a final paper that you spend all semester working on. Her online class format is super organized and clear.

THE BEST PROFESSOR EVER!!! I am terrible at english and professor Howard made this class easy and enjoyable. Assignments are super easy just turn them in on time and try your best and you will get an A. I ended the class with a 97!

TAKE PROFESSOR HOWARD! She is so sweet and laid back. I took her online and she gave us three easy weekly assignments due every Sunday. I was able to complete each week's work in one hour. Definitely a class that you don't have to stress over. She's very caring and laid back on her grading as well (gives lots of 100's). Just do the work; easy A!

I took her for ENGL1101 last semester and decided to take her again for 1102. Definitely recommend. The class is quite slow-paced, and the weekly workload is not bad at all. She does require "attendance" (aka copying and pasting a paragraph into the discussion board each week to show you've logged in). Easy A, very kind and thoughtful professor.

It was a pleasure taking ENGL 1101 with Dr. Laura Howard. She is very informative and I love how she provides excellent feedback on your papers. Attendance was important in her class. There were a few class exercises, 3 letters to the reader and 3 papers. Normally I do not like to write but she made this class very enjoyable. I would recommend her!

Probably my favorite professor that I have ever taken. Online course consisted of weekly "attendance check-in," some small assignments here and there, and 3 major papers. You can reach her by text or email. She helped me out so much, even talked with me on the phone to help me select a paper topic! Ended the class with a 99.

She is amazing! I loved this class, and I wish that I could take her again. The course is fairly easy, but you still have to do the work. I enjoy English, and this class allowed me to hone my writing skills. She was very easy to get in touch with, and she offers useful feedback. She really cares.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Clear grading criteria

comment: TAKE HER! She is absolutely amazing. Down to earth and cares about her students. She gives amazing feedback and allows you to actually grow as a writer. Some assignments are tedious but easy. You have an assignment due every week but it is so easy to balance with a full course load. I truly grew from this class... you will not regret taking her!

Professor Howard is such a great English professor. I feel like I have been able to learn so much and she has given lots of information that I can take away from this class. She always made sure that everyone knew she was there to help us with anything for this course. Take her, you won't regret it at all. Weekly modules are due every Monday.

Professor Howard really cares about her students. She even helped me when I was trying to make a resume for a job. The essays aren't too hard, and she sometimes would give examples. She is very understanding of college students' circumstances, so we didn't even need a book.

I loved her and would take her again in a heartbeat! She was clear about instructions but also very willing to help when I didn't totally understand things. There were assignments (papers and discussions) that took a little bit of time, but they weren't difficult and were informative. I would definitely recommend her!!
Honestly if you do your weekly assignments you will do fine in the class. All weekly assignments are due the same time every week.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Dr. Howard is pretty chill, I took her online English class and didn't have nay problems. You can text or e-mail her and she pretty much responds right away. Only thing is she is a really slow grader but does offer extra credit at the end of the semester. There was weekly readings and discussions. Just stay on the modules in D2L and you're ok.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: She's sweet and will help you pass but she doesn't grade anything. It's week 15 out of 15 right now and only 3 of the 35 grades have been graded. Do not take for online! Other than that she's the basic professor.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Participation matters--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Loved Professor Howard, papers werent that bad and work load was fairly easy. Gives great feedback and wants you to succeed.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Dr. Howard is so sweet. I had her for hybrid English & the class was very easy. 4 projects & if you follow the rubric exactly she will give you a 100. I got 100 on all of mine. Do all your discussions & have some involvement in class you could make a 100. I had all 100s on assignments and one 0 bc only bc I actually didnt do it. Take her!!

Dr. Howard is one of the best professors I  ever had. She is super sweet and really wants her students to exceed! You have 4 projects, weekly online readings/videos and assignments, in class participation, and no final or midterm. The material is actually interesting and applicable in real life. Only negative is she is slow on grading.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: she is awesome, very very helpful. she will go out of her way just to help you and makes sure you succeed. i highly recommend her!!! i loved this professor, and really enjoyed the class.

Professor Howard is honestly one of the sweetest professors I've had. She takes the time to ensure that you understand what you're writing about. If majority of the class is having a hard time with something, she'll typically extend the deadline or let you turn it in at a later date. She's super chill and understanding if you talk to her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring

comment: Great teacher. Class flies by. Most classwork is done on your own time online (hybrid). Gives extra credit at the end of the term. Gives great feedback and really cares about students. Assignments are major-related. Almost made me want to become an English major, just so I could take her again.

I absolutely loved this teacher! Hands down my favorite professor. She was always so helpful and even allowed extra time after the due date to submit your work. We had a 7-10 page paper due at the end of the semester but it was due in sections so it was easy to do in my opinion. Definitely an great class and easy to make an A if you do your work.

I took this as a Hybrid Class and she always was late opening assignments each week. The class has a long research paper but she breaks it up into sections over a few weeks. I made an A but I really had to work for it. If you are self-disciplined you will do fine.. but if you need structure from a teacher don't take her because she is not organized

Shes super nice and has office hours to help you if you need it. I took this class as a hybrid and we had homework every week so as long as your willing to have an assignment due every weekend the class is an easy A.
She was very scattered and confusing on what she wanted from the class. She was nice, but not very helpful.

She is a great professor! Actually cares about her students. Her grading rubric is very specific so as long as you follow it you will do good. She allows you to revise a paper at the end if you got lower than a B. Does conferences to review what you have so far for an assignment. Im taking her again for a second semester thats how much I like her.
